betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The mod AromaBackup (AB) is included in the pack to backup your world. 
You can adjust save path, frequency, and the number of backups to keep in its settings at 'config\aroma1997'. 
You can also use another mod like ServerUtilities, or even an external program. 
Don't use several backup mods at once - it will just waste your CPU power and storage space.

If you need to restore from a backup, the ones from AB are found in the backups folder in the instance directory, not the world save directory.

Remember that the mods JourneyMap and Thaumcraft Node Tracker store information outside of what most solutions back up, so please backup your journeymap and tcnodetracker folders yourself. 

The Thaumcraft data is a little buggy, losing scanned aspect data and Thaumonomicon data, so consider backing it up as well. The file is at 'saves\<worldname>\playerdata\<nameofplayer>.thaum'.

If you move to another drive or computer, don't forget to migrate all the backed up files, not just the world folder.
